description:
She's a Victoria's Secret newcomer and crowned an Angel in 2015.Romee Strijd，2015年维多利亚的秘密新晋天使超模。

And on Saturday, Romee Strijd proved her photogenic prowess as she stepped out in New York looking effortlessly gorgeous.在周六，Romee Strijd现身纽约街头。镜头下的她，光彩夺目，十分上镜！

The 21-year-old sizzled in a sheer off-white tank top and no bra, posing on a Manhattan sidewalk with her boyfriend and fellow Netherlander Laurens van Leeuwen.这个21岁的超模，上身只穿了一件白色小背心，在曼哈顿人行道上和男友Laurens van Leeuwen（企业咨询师）散步。

She was accompanied by her boyfriend, Dutch business consultant Laurens van Leeuwen照片中，Romee正由男朋友陪着，她男友是Laurens van Leeuwen，一个企业咨询师，荷兰人。

The Dutch Vogue cover girl let her blonde hair fall over the rumpled olive green shirt she threw over the outfit. Impossibly skinny jeans hugged her needle-like legs.Romee登上过荷兰版《Vogue》杂志的封面。在街拍照中，她的金色长发随意披散在她橄榄绿的短袖上。紧身牛仔裤凸显了她细长的双腿。

She accessorised her ensemble with a black Chanel purse, green aviator shades and a light grey Urban Outfitters bandanna tied about her neck in an ascot knot.她背着黑色香奈儿小宝，绿色的飞行员外套和浅灰色的Urban Outfitters牛仔裤，并在脖子系上一根丝巾装饰。

The Zoetermeer native's boyfriend looked like exactly the sort of 'business consultant' a model would date, cutting a suave figure in head-to-toe black.她男友一袭黑衣，温文尔雅，看起来是一个很成功的企业咨询师，和Romme十分登对。

His hair in a perfect pompadour, he wore a collarless black shirt that hinted at the well-built torso he has a habit of showing off in shirtless Instagram photos.他头发整体后翻，黑色的无领衬衫显示了他完美的身材。在Instagram上，他放了很多显示自己身材的照片！

Pairing the shirt with black jeans, the Amsterdammer heightened his Continental look with black loafers and no socks as he held his girlfriend's hand.下身，他搭配了黑色牛仔裤。黑色的一脚蹬让他看起来更像是一个欧洲绅士。照片中，他紧紧握着Romme的手（看起来，两人十分恩爱）！

title: 维秘新晋天使，纽约街拍。完美身材一览无余！
